QuestData.Title: Salvaging a Disaster
QuestData.Description: Birch and I are helping out the expedition with field studies. I'm not much of a fighter, but I can't make another mistake, they might demote me!$b$bCould you recover some of the relics we packed up in boxes around the cave?
QuestData.RewardText: I can't wait to see what sort of power I can squeeze out of these.
